articles.title: Vinicius Jr Misses, Philippe Coutinho Returns to Brazil Squad for World Cup Qualifiers
articles.description: Philippe Coutinho has been recalled to Brazil's national squad for 2022 World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina, having last played in October last year.
articles.content: Barcelona midfielder Philippe Coutinho has been recalled to Brazil’s national squad for 2022 World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina. The 29-year-old has not represented the Selecao since October last year because of a left knee injury th... [1704 chars]

articles.title: Tite explains why Everton's Richarlison has been left out of latest Brazil squad
articles.description: Everton forward Richarlison has been left out of the Brazil squad for the fixtures with Colombia and Argentina
articles.content:
Brazil boss Tite has explained why he has opted to leave Richarlison out of his squad for his side’s upcoming November fixtures.
The Everton forward has been left out of the Selecao’s 23-man pool for the fixtures with Colombia and Argentina next mont... [2080 chars]

articles.title: Kashmiri Girl Wins Gold Medal in U-14 Category of World Kickboxing Championship
articles.description: 13-year-old Tajamul Islam beat Argentina's Lalina in the final of the World Kickboxing Championship to win gold in the U-14 category.
articles.content: Tajamul Islam, Kashmir’s 13-year-old kickboxer, won the gold medal in the U-14 category at World Kickboxing Championship in Cairo, Egypt on October 22. Islam is the first Kashmiri girl to have represented India in the competition, which took place fr... [1636 chars]

articles.title: Coutinho rejoins Brazil for World Cup qualifiers
articles.description: Barcelona midfielder Philippe Coutinho got the call-up from Brazil coach Tite on Friday after a year-long absence for upcoming World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina.
articles.content:
Coutinho rejoins Brazil for World Cup qualifiers
RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct 29, 2021 (AFP) – Barcelona midfielder Philippe Coutinho got the call-up from Brazil coach Tite on Friday after a year-long absence for upcoming World Cup qualifiers against Colombia... [1836 chars]

articles.title: Former IMF official says Argentina will not pay the Fund
articles.description: A former official at the International Monetary Fund said Argentina is "not going to pay" the Fund and any agreement between the two will be a "temporary Band-Aid" that will only delay a run on banks in the South American country.
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - A former official at the International Monetary Fund said Argentina is “not going to pay” the Fund and any agreement between the two will be a “temporary Band-Aid” that will only delay a run on banks in the South American country... [2171 chars]

articles.title: Villa handed lift as key star returns after dealing with family emergency
articles.description: Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez looks certain to face West Ham on Sunday after returning from Argentina following a family emergency involving his father.
articles.content:

articles.title: Emi Martinez update after family emergency and ahead of Aston Villa's clash with West Ham
articles.description: Here's the latest after Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez flew back to Argentina to be with his stricken father Alberto this past week
articles.content:
Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez will train at Bodymoor Heath this afternoon after returning from Argentina following a family emergency involving his father, Alberto.

articles.title: Consistency the aim as Farrell takes a long-view on Ireland ambitions
articles.description: There’s usually a theme when Andy Farrell speaks to the media and yesterday ‘consistency’ was a thread that wove its way through his answers as he looked ahead to the November internationals against Japan, New Zealand and Argentina.
